events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but it doesn't fit me at all. I'd like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's message mentions a refund request due to size issues. Categorizing the case under Refund.
Assigning this refund case to the returns specialist team for further assistance.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out about your jacket. I'm here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in original packaging?
Sure, my order number is 789654123. The jacket is brand new, still with tags attached and in its original packaging.
Thank you for the details. I have initiated the refund process for your order. You will receive a return label shortly via email.
Thanks for the quick help! I appreciate the easy process and look forward to receiving the return label.
The refund case is now marked as resolved after initiating the return label delivery and refund process.
Just checking in to confirm if you have received the return label and if the refund process met your expectations.
After no further inquiries from the customer, the refund case has been formally closed. Thank you for contacting us.
